messages.message: Anybody interested in developing an algorithm for paragraph detection given a list of words and their coordinates?
We're in need of an approach since we only have paragraph detection for ABBYY. Ideally, I believe we should move to a universal paragraph approach that is not per provider, but based on our own logic
This is for SC comparison of Tesseract and ABBYY, but will be more useful generally if others request a paragraph layout
